data.caption: Clarification On Record Date For Interim Dividend For FY 2025-26
data.news_body: With reference to the outcome of the Board Meeting filed on 10th February 2026 announcing the Record Date for interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26 please note that the day of the record date was mentioned as Friday instead of Thursday. You are requested to read the day of record date for interim dividend as Thursday. There is no other change in the details relating to this record date.

data.caption: Clarification On Record Date For Interim Dividend For FY 2025-26
data.news_body: With reference to the outcome of the Board Meeting filed on 10th February 2026 announcing the Record Date (19th February 2026) for interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26 please note that the day of the record date was mentioned as Friday instead of Thursday. You are requested to read the day of record date for interim dividend as Thursday. There is no other change in the details relating to this record date.

data.caption: Fixation Of Record Date For Payment Of Interim Dividend Declared By The Board Of Directors In Their Meeting Held On 12Th February 2025.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their meeting held on 10th February 2025 has declared the payment of Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26 at 50% i.e. Re 1 per equity share and 19th February 2026 (Friday) has been fixed as the Record Date for the said payment.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation For Re-Schedule Of Board Meeting For Q3 FY 2025-26
data.news_body:
Ashiana Housing Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 and for declaration of Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26 apart from transacting other routine items.

Please note that this Board meeting was initially scheduled to be held on 06th February 2026 and has been re-scheduled to 10th February 2026 for unavoidable circumstances.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body:
Ashiana Housing Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is with reference to the intimation submitted to your Exchange on 01st August 2025 pertaining to meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company for consideration of quarterly financial results amongst other agenda items scheduled to be held on Friday 12th August 2025 in Jaipur it was erroneously written as 30th June 2024 instead of 30th June 2025. 

You are requested to read the intimation as for the quarter ended on 30th June 2025 in place of 30th June 2024. All other details given in the intimation dated 01st August 2025 will remain the same. Also there is no change in the XBRL filing of the said intimation.

data.news_body: Ashiana Housing Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve ASHIANA HOUSING LTD.-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the company for the FY 2024-25 and to recommend dividend if any apart from transacting other routine items.
